channel.title: Still need help, Teleblock!
channel.description:
i need to know how to change the teleblock timer, that would be very helpful, but something even more helpful would be if you could help me change the teleblock timer to a specified time if on a custom teleport i say [code]teleblock=true;[/code] like is there a way to make that less time then a regular one.
or even more helpful would be if there is some code that you can add, making it so if a person is teleblocked in combat, and they kill their opponent, the teleblock is lifted?
if you can answer any of those questions, plz do. I've been asking this question for a long while and still havent got an answer.
Help PLZ!

item.title: Still need help, Teleblock!
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

sigh… cj own u… u must not have coded long… or u would know java? … o.0.0.o … ur being stupid too? hes a n00b … he doesnt know java… and its not basic java… cuz theres only like… 500,000 people in the U.S. that know it… and around 5 Million people who know it around the world. so not everyone knows java?..

is it jsut me or are americans losing the war here? i mean... bill gates could teach me this shit!
... all i asked u to do... was find me the Dragon Scimitar Item ID...
LIKE I SAID BEFORE! ... I NEED SOMEONE WHO IS So0OPER SMART! to teach me this shit!

Read full topic

Check the teleblock method. That’s your best bet, since that’s what’s initializing it.

item.title: Still need help, Teleblock!
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

But I was asking if you were referring to the thread sleeping, which I said is bad. Only had to do with the execution of the method.

cj own u:

I’m wondering if i can change how long the teleblock timer is

Once again, you’re asking about timers, and you supplied us with a boolean.

Read full topic

item.title: Still need help, Teleblock!
item.dc:creator: @Pulmonary Pulmonary
item.description:
@Pulmonary wrote:

[quote=“o.O O.o, post:4, topic:282520”][quote author=Pulmonary link=topic=373335.msg2816483#msg2816483 date=1244320810]
teleblock=true;
Sleep(“60000”); // = 1minute. I don’t know the name for it, that’s what it is in c++ just change it to how yours is
teleblock=false; //teleblock turns off
Message(“You can now teleport.”);

[/quote]

Are you talking about Thread.sleep? Bad idea…
@topic I don’t get your question… You mention timer, and show boolean?[/quote]

Read the comment after the code. That’s the method for c++. I don’t know what it is for java.

Sleep("60000"); // = 1minute. I don't know the name for it, that's what it is in c++ just change it to how yours is

Read full topic
